room_title: Escape room "Special Ops" by The Escape Game Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Celebrated my birthday with my family and did the Special Ops room. Experience-Guide Chris and staff even gave me a signed birthday card. Nice!! Had a great time watching how smart everyone was in different ways. Loved that.

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops" by The Escape Game Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: We played the special ops escape room and our game guide was Phil and it was the best escape game Iâ€™ve ever played!

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops" by The Escape Game Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: This was exciting and worth the money. The employees were upbeat and helpful and the 60 minutes we spent inside will give us years of memories! Thank you!!

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops" by The Escape Game Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: We've done Gold Rush and Special Ops: Mystery Market, and both were really well-crafted and challenging. With 4 of us, we only had a few minutes to spare, so we got our money's worth! Staff is friendly, professional, and helpful.

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops" by The Escape Game Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: This had a number of unique puzzles to solve, but too many "nudges" from the game master were necessary to point out how we needed to progress after solving a puzzle.  Also, many of puzzles cannot be solved simultaneously, so I suggest not playing the room at capacity... part of the group will get bored since space won't allow you to all be working on the same thing.Played with a mixed-party group of 7: 1 child, 6 adults, 3 of whom were complete novices. Difficulty rating of 3 seems correct. Solved.
